org.apache.log4j.pattern

类 FormattingInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.pattern.FormattingInfo

  • public final class FormattingInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Modifies the output of a pattern converter for a specified minimum and maximum width and alignment.
    作者:
    Jim Cakalic, Ceki Gülcü, Curt Arnold

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      FormattingInfo(boolean leftAlign, int minLength, int maxLength)
      Creates new instance.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void format(int fieldStart, java.lang.StringBuffer buffer)
      Adjust the content of the buffer based on the specified lengths and alignment.
      static FormattingInfo getDefault()
      Gets default instance.
      int getMaxLength()
      Get maximum length.
      int getMinLength()
      Get minimum length.
      boolean isLeftAligned()
      Determine if left aligned.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • FormattingInfo

        public FormattingInfo(boolean leftAlign,
              int minLength,
              int maxLength)
        Creates new instance.
        参数:
        leftAlign - left align if true.
        minLength - minimum length.
        maxLength - maximum length.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDefault

        public static FormattingInfo getDefault()
        Gets default instance.
        返回:
        default instance.

      • isLeftAligned

        public boolean isLeftAligned()
        Determine if left aligned.
        返回:
        true if left aligned.

      • getMinLength

        public int getMinLength()
        Get minimum length.
        返回:
        minimum length.

      • getMaxLength

        public int getMaxLength()
        Get maximum length.
        返回:
        maximum length.

      • format

        public void format(int fieldStart,
          java.lang.StringBuffer buffer)
        Adjust the content of the buffer based on the specified lengths and alignment.
        参数:
        fieldStart - start of field in buffer.
        buffer - buffer to be modified.
